title: daniosem
author: daniosem
content: Selling Limited Edition Atoms Bitcoin Model 000 ShoesMen Size 9Brand new in Box, never worn.Just in time for the Bull Run.Release page:https://atoms.com/products/atoms-00-bitcoinSold Out Sep 2021 (price 145$).I will consider offers, 10% if paid in ETH/BTC.eBay listing for more details - https://www.ebay.com/itm/225854735134Would prefer to sell outside of eBay.

comments.author: markinaz
comments.body: Just to set expectations, if you look at completed auctions there is a more realistic price:https://www.ebay.com/sch/i.html?_from=R40&_nkw=Atoms+Bitcoin++Shoes&_sacat=0&rt=nc&LH_Sold=1&LH_Complete=1
